posts.post_content:
Posted By: Zach Rice
Up for sale are four subjects from possibly toughest set produced by Allen and Ginter, the N43 set. I included large scans but the side of the card in the top right is cut off in the picture (not really like that in real life). All cards present very well and would make a great addition to any collection. Please email me if interested in any and for a better description of them. The Ives which has an ex+ front does have an extremely minor corner wrinkle that only shows through the back. Thanks.

Posted By: BcD
fill me in on the scoop? I'm interested

cardknowledge@earthlink.net

Posted By: Zach Rice
Here are better scans for those who asked.  The East has a tiny bit of paper loss on the back.

Posted By: Zach Rice
East and Ives still available. $300 takes the pair.

Cards have been traded. Thanks.
